*Justo* module for installing *ArangoDB* on *Ubuntu*.

*Proudly made with â™¥ in Valencia, Spain, EU.*

# Installing ArangoDB with Justo

```
$ npm install -g install-arangodb-on-ubuntu
$ justo -m install-arangodb-on-ubuntu
```
